name: AccountCompromise
description: Case template for handling compromised user or service accounts.
author: Jes√∫s Angosto
summary: Investigation and mitigation of an account compromise.

tasks.title: Identify compromised accounts
tasks.description: Review access logs and alerts to detect affected accounts.

tasks.title: Review suspicious activity
tasks.description: Analyze forwarding rules, logins from unusual locations, and anomalous behavior.

tasks.title: Contain and mitigate
tasks.description: Force password resets and enable MFA on affected accounts.

tasks.title: Notify impacted parties
tasks.description: Inform users and the appropriate departments.

tasks.title: Strengthen authentication policies
tasks.description: Update password requirements and access security policies.

tasks.title: Maintain chain of custody
tasks.description: Record and preserve evidence of account activity and access.

tasks.title: Document lessons learned
tasks.description: Capture findings and update security procedures.

notes.title: Compromised accounts
notes.content: List of affected accounts and description of malicious activity.

notes.title: Collected evidence
notes.content: Access logs and suspicious activity details.

notes.title: Chain of custody
notes.content: Record of how evidence related to access and activity was preserved.

notes.title: Lessons learned
notes.content: Recommendations to prevent future account compromises.
